arts.ttl: Dortmund updates: Schlotterbeck to miss out against Augsburg – Can set for return to squad
arts.sum: Ruhr Nachrichten reports that Nico Schlotterbeck will be rested for Borussia Dortmund’s trip to Augsburg on Friday, while Emre Can is set to make his long-awaited return to the squad.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs Augsburg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are set to take on Augsburg at the WWK Arena this Friday evening in their next Bundesliga fixture. arts.ttl: FC Augsburg vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: Will form continue to haunt the hosts on Halloween?
arts.sum: Two teams in very different veins of form in FC Augsburg and Borussia Dortmund clash on Friday evening to kick-start Matchday 9 of the Bundesliga - here's our preview for the game below.

arts.ttl: Kovac gives squad update ahead of Borussia Dortmund's clash with Augsburg
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund coach Niko Kovac provided a personnel update at a press conference on Thursday.
